p: In a manner analogous to Example 66, the title compound may be obtained by reacting 4-[2-(3-aminophenyl)pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-3-yl]-N-(3-fluorophenyl)-2-pyrimidinamine and 2-thiophenecarbonyl[(1,1-dimethylethyl)oxy]benzoyl chloride. HRMS calcd for C 31H 20F 4N 6O 2: 584.1584, found: 585.1666 (M+H +)
